long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From now on you can visit everyone's favorite websites, and share your websites with everyone.
The item allows you to upload the sites you like to the plugin and other people will be able to rate them and will be able to see what people liked the most and thus discover a new world around the Internet.
You should install the plugin to expand your world of content and discover new things every day.
Every time the plugin is opened, it brings up 5 random websites and arranges them according to their rating, so every time you are guaranteed to discover new websites.
